title: A Triple Bond Broken: The Destruction of the House of York
itunes:title: A Triple Bond Broken: The Destruction of the House of York
itunes:subtitle: In a lecture from our 2019 History Weekend in Winchester, Thomas Penn explores the turbulent relationship between Edward IV, George, Duke of Clarence and Richard III. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In a lecture he delivered at our 2019 BBC History Magazine History Weekend in Winchester, historian and author Thomas Penn explores the turbulent relationship between three brothers: Edward IV, George, Duke of Clarence and Richard III. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
